events.name: china's policies support EV manufacturing sector
events.wd_label: china's policies support EV manufacturing sector
events.wd_description: China has pursued various policies intended to support the EV manufacturing sector, including subsidies, production quotas, and higher fuel economy standards.
events.description: China has pursued various policies intended to support the EV manufacturing sector, including subsidies, production quotas, and higher fuel economy standards.

events.name: vertically integrated supply chain development
events.wd_description: China has developed a vertically integrated supply chain comprised of both private and stateowned enterprises with domestic and/or foreign mining and refining facilities, as well as LIB and EV manufacturing facilities.
events.description: China has developed a vertically integrated supply chain comprised of both private and stateowned enterprises with domestic and/or foreign mining and refining facilities, as well as LIB and EV manufacturing facilities.

events.name: global LIB cathode manufacturing capacity increase
events.wd_label: global LIB cathode manufacturing capacity increase
events.wd_description: According to Japan's Nano Research Institute, China accounted for over 66 percent of global LIB cathode (cobalt-intensive) manufacturing capacity in 2017.
events.description: According to Japan's Nano Research Institute, China accounted for over 66 percent of global LIB cathode (cobalt-intensive) manufacturing capacity in 2017.

events.name: total share of global cobalt sulfate production and LIB manufacturing increase
events.wd_label: total share of global cobalt sulfate production and LIB manufacturing increase
events.wd_description: Benchmark Mineral Intelligence notes that the country's total share of global cobalt sulfate production and LIB manufacturing could increase to 80 percent and 55 percent, respectively, by 2020.
events.description: Benchmark Mineral Intelligence notes that the country's total share of global cobalt sulfate production and LIB manufacturing could increase to 80 percent and 55 percent, respectively, by 2020.

events.name: China accounts for 47% of the global EV stock
events.wd_label: China accounts for 47% of the global EV stock
events.wd_description: Similarly, China already accounts for 47 percent of the global EV stock.
events.description: Similarly, China already accounts for 47 percent of the global EV stock.

events.name: government policies
events.wd_description: Government policies and incentives support the growth of the EV industry and the development of the battery supply chain.
events.description: Government policies and incentives support the growth of the EV industry and the development of the battery supply chain.

events.name: Made in China 2025
events.description: China's policy to modernize its manufacturing industries and promote renewable energy technologies.
